doc:
Jean Marais https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean_Marais 0 Jean-Alfred Villain-Marais (French: [ʒɑ̃ maʁɛ]; 11 December 1913 – 8 November 1998), known professionally as Jean Marais, was a French actor, writer, director and sculptor. He performed in over 100 films and was the muse of acclaimed director Jean Cocteau. In 1996, he was awarded the French Legion of Honor for his contributions to French Cinema. Jean-Alfred_Villain-Marais ( French : [_ʒɑ̃_maʁɛ_] ; 11_December_1913 – 8_November_1998 ) , known professionally as Jean_Marais , was a_French_actor , writer_,_director_and_sculptor . He performed in over_100_films and was the_muse of acclaimed_director_Jean_Cocteau . In 1996 , he was_awarded the_French_Legion of Honor for his_contributions to French_Cinema .
